text: table table object created datatable() columns indices columns formatted (can character, numeric, logical, formula form ~ V1 + V2, equivalent c('V1', 'V2')) valueColumns indices columns cell values obtained; can different columns argument, e.g. may style one column based values different column ... Arguments passed DT::formatStyle, DT::styleColorBar, styleDivergentBar target target apply CSS styles (current cell full row) fontWeight font weight, e.g. 'bold' 'normal' color font color, e.g. 'red' '#ee00aa' backgroundColor background color table cells background background table cells data numeric vector whose range used scaling table data 0-100 represented color bars. vector length 2 acceptable specifying range possibly wider narrower range table data . angle number degrees representing direction fill gradient relative horizontal line gradient line, going counter-clockwise. example, 90 fills right left -90 fills left right. color_pos color bars positive values color_neg color bars negative values divergent (logical) Whether use styleDivergentBar

title: Custom datatable callback Javascript — DT_callback
text: Custom datatable callback Javascript

title: Custom datatable callback Javascript — DT_callback
code: DT_callback(   ...,   search_icon = TRUE,   page_input = TRUE,   pageLength_input = TRUE,   filter_placeholders = TRUE,   retain_policy_color = TRUE,   retain_selections = TRUE,   tab_accessible = FALSE,   debugger = FALSE )

title: Custom datatable callback Javascript — DT_callback
text: ... chr arbitrary character strings add JS search_icon lgl Whether replace "Search:" search field FontAwesome magnifying class symbol. Requires FontAwesome (typically included shiny). page_input lgl Whether include custom Shiny input saves page number input$[table output id]_page. pageLength_input lgl Whether include custom Shiny input saves pageLength input$[table output id]_pageLength. filter_placeholders lgl Whether replace Filter column placeholders using JS function dt_filter_placeholders retain_policy_color lgl Whether retain color Policy ID column. retain_selections lgl Whether retain selections previous render table tab_accessible lgl Whether enable row selection pressing Enter key. Requires extensions = 'KeyTables' options = list(keys = TRUE). Sets jQuery event listener need re-established table redraw. debugger lgl Whether insert debugger statement callback function

title: Custom datatable callback Javascript — DT_callback
text: chr/JS_EVAL Generated JS

title: Custom datatable callback Javascript — DT_callback
text: preserve page number, custom shiny input must set end DT render function, followed observer page input uses selectPage update page via dataTableProxy. preserve pageLength, page length input must passed pageLength option DT call following pattern shiny::isolate(input$[table output id]_pageLength) %||% default value default value just default pageLength wish supply event pageLength NULL.

what: Format numbers in a datatable — DT_formatNum
title: Format numbers in a datatable — DT_formatNum
text: Format datatable numeric values commas decimal places Format datatable numeric values commas decimal places

title: Format numbers in a datatable — DT_formatNum
code: DT_formatNum(   table,   columns = names(purrr::keep(table$x$data, is.numeric)),   currency = "",   interval = 3,   mark = ",",   digits = 0,   dec.mark = getOption("OutDec"),   before = TRUE,   zero.print = NULL,   rows = NULL )  DT_formatNum(   table,   columns = names(purrr::keep(table$x$data, is.numeric)),   currency = "",   interval = 3,   mark = ",",   digits = 0,   dec.mark = getOption("OutDec"),   before = TRUE,   zero.print = NULL,   rows = NULL )

title: Format numbers in a datatable — DT_formatNum
text: table table object created datatable() columns indices columns formatted (can character, numeric, logical, formula form ~ V1 + V2, equivalent c('V1', 'V2')) currency currency symbol interval put marker many digits numbers mark marker every interval decimals numbers digits number decimal places round dec.mark character indicate decimal point whether place currency symbol values zero.print string specify zeros formatted. Useful many zero values exist. NULL, keeps zero . rows integer vector (starting 1) specify rows style applies . default, NULL, meaning rows formatted. Note, formatStyle() support argument use styleRow() instead. addition, works expected client-side processing mode, .e., server = FALSE.

title: Format numbers in a datatable — DT_formatNum

text: id chr ID DT output tippy headers col_nms chr Column names exactly displayed rendered DT tooltips chr content tooltips, currently character strings supported. Make issue like see HTML supported calls_only lgl whether just return tippy calls, called runjs .ns fun ns function asis lgl Whether id used asis, automatically namespaced.

title: Style rows of a datatable using source_cols/ID — DT_style_row
text: table datatable columns indices columns formatted (can character, numeric, logical, formula form ~ V1 + V2, equivalent c('V1', 'V2')) rows Row Indexes (starting 1) applies CSS style. integer vector list integer vectors, whose length must equal length values, values scalar. valueColumns indices columns cell values obtained; can different columns argument, e.g. may style one column based values different column target target apply CSS styles (current cell full row) fontWeight font weight, e.g. 'bold' 'normal' color call DT_style_row_color uses rows, values & default impute background foreground colors based luminance. default string NULL used default CSS value values levels. NULL, CSS value non-matched cells left unchanged. backgroundColor background color table cells ... Arguments passed DT::formatStyle background background table cells

title: Create a call to styleRow for matching color to backgroundColor for contrast — DT_style_row_color

NULL, CSS value non-matched cells left unchanged. luminance_threshold num value 0 1 luminance threshold background shifts color contrasting color text_dark chr CSS color dark text text_light chr CSS color light text

what: Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar

text: Style DT color bars values diverge 0. federicomarini/GeneTonic

title: Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar
Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar
text: data numeric vector whose range used scaling table data 0-100 represented color bars. vector length 2 acceptable specifying range possibly wider narrower range table data . color_pos color bars positive values color_neg color bars negative values

title: Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar
text: function generates JavaScript CSS code values specified R, used DT tables formatting.

title: Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar
text: function draws background color bars behind table cells column, width width bars proportional column values color dependent sign value. typical usage values log2FoldChange tables resulting differential expression analysis. Still, functionality can quickly generalized cases - see examples. code function heavily inspired styleColorBar, borrows full hands excellent post StackOverflow - https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33521828/stylecolorbar-center--shift-left-right-dependent--sign/33524422#33524422

title: Style DT divergent color bar — styleDivergentBar
code: simplest_df <- data.frame(   a = c(rep("a", 9)),   value = c(-4, -3, -2, -1, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4) )  # or with a very simple data frame DT::datatable(simplest_df) %>%   formatStyle(     "value",     background = styleColorBar_divergent(       simplest_df$value,       scales::alpha("forestgreen", 0.4),       scales::alpha("gold", 0.4)     ),     backgroundSize = "100% 90%",     backgroundRepeat = "no-repeat",     backgroundPosition = "center"   ) #> Error in styleColorBar_divergent(simplest_df$value, scales::alpha("forestgreen",     0.4), scales::alpha("gold", 0.4)): could not find function "styleColorBar_divergent"
